description:
Running rev 1172, when resizing from novaclient, the following error is generated in Compute:

2011-06-14 04:48:22,833 ERROR nova.exception [-] Uncaught exception
(nova.exception): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 87, in _wrap
(nova.exception): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 104, in decorated_function
(nova.exception): TRACE:     function(self, context, instance_id, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 613, in resize_instance
(nova.exception): TRACE:     instance_ref, migration_ref['dest_host'])
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi_conn.py", line 242, in migrate_disk_and_power_off
(nova.exception): TRACE:     return self._vmops.migrate_disk_and_power_off(instance, dest)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 370, in migrate_disk_and_power_off
(nova.exception): TRACE:     template_vm_ref, template_vdi_uuids = self._get_snapshot(instance)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 345, in _get_snapshot
(nova.exception): TRACE:     self._session, instance.id, vm_ref, label)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 310, in create_snapshot
(nova.exception): TRACE:     vm_vdi_ref, vm_vdi_rec = cls.get_vdi_for_vm_safely(session, vm_ref)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 295, in get_vdi_for_vm_safely
(nova.exception): TRACE:     " for VM %(vm_ref)s") % locals())
(nova.exception): TRACE: Exception: Unexpected number of VDIs (2) found for VM OpaqueRef:524fb856-1e8e-1551-1326-b484a09a3a60
(nova.exception): TRACE:
2011-06-14 04:48:22,906 ERROR nova [-] Exception during message handling
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 232, in _process_data
(nova): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 93, in _wrap
(nova): TRACE:     raise Error(str(e))
(nova): TRACE: Error: Unexpected number of VDIs (2) found for VM OpaqueRef:524fb856-1e8e-1551-1326-b484a09a3a60
(nova): TRACE:
title: Unexpected number of VDIs found during XenServer resize

comments.content:
2011-06-14 04:48:22,833 ERROR nova.exception [-] Uncaught exception
(nova.exception): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 87, in _wrap
(nova.exception): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kw)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 104, in decorated_function
(nova.exception): TRACE:     function(self, context, instance_id, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 613, in resize_instance
(nova.exception): TRACE:     instance_ref, migration_ref['dest_host'])
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi_conn.py", line 242, in migrate_disk_and_power_off
(nova.exception): TRACE:     return self._vmops.migrate_disk_and_power_off(instance, dest)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 370, in migrate_disk_and_power_off
(nova.exception): TRACE:     template_vm_ref, template_vdi_uuids = self._get_snapshot(instance)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 345, in _get_snapshot
(nova.exception): TRACE:     self._session, instance.id, vm_ref, label)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 310, in create_snapshot
(nova.exception): TRACE:     vm_vdi_ref, vm_vdi_rec = cls.get_vdi_for_vm_safely(session, vm_ref)
(nova.exception): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py", line 295, in get_vdi_for_vm_safely
(nova.exception): TRACE:     " for VM %(vm_ref)s") % locals())
(nova.exception): TRACE: Exception: Unexpected number of VDIs (2) found for VM OpaqueRef:524fb856-1e8e-1551-1326-b484a09a3a60
(nova.exception): TRACE: 
2011-06-14 04:48:22,906 ERROR nova [-] Exception during message handling
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/rpc.py", line 232, in _process_data
(nova): TRACE:     rval = node_func(context=ctxt, **node_args)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/exception.py", line 93, in _wrap
(nova): TRACE:     raise Error(str(e))
(nova): TRACE: Error: Unexpected number of VDIs (2) found for VM OpaqueRef:524fb856-1e8e-1551-1326-b484a09a3a60

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content: Also seeing this on snapshot creation. Don't think it's related to resize explicitly
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cerberus

comments.content: Seems to be related to vm_utils method "get_vdi_for_vm_safely" which is assuming that there's only one VDI for an instance. Now that swap exists, this isn't true.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cerberus
